page.title: 02LANDSCAPE
page.content: The area round the village of Arborfield is mostly undulating grassland.(Enclosed rough grazing) there are several farms in the area ; some for sheep,some for cows and others for arable farming.Arborfeild is a nice village with a local shop, hair dresser,park,riding stables, memorial,infant school,junior school and Garrison.The junior school was built in 1873.The infant school is much newer.The local shop is a post office as well and it sells almost anything. The Garrison has a school of Electronic Engineering, post office, 2 playing fields, 2 tennis courts, rifle range and church. Arborfeild Cross is a very busy place because five roads meet and a lot of traffic goes through it every day.
